editorialNotes.standard: Hipster Whale's Apple Design Awardâwinning game takes a timeless arcade formulaâcross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstaclesâand transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, youâll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. Thereâs a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other gamesâlike Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Roadâs wacky world are unmistakable.
